actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fabrics of man-made fibers consisting of one or two layers of expanded poly-tetrafluoroethylene sheeting layered between an outer knit fabric wholly of nylon and another outer woven fabric containing by weight 65 percent or more of micro fiber polyester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on fabrics of man-made fibers consisting of one or two layers of expanded poly-tetrafluoroethylene sheeting layered between an outer knit fabric wholly of nylon and another o9uter woven fabric containing by weight 65 percent or more of micro fiber polyester.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fabrics of man-made fibers consisting of one or two layers of expanded poly-tetrafluoroethylene sheeting layered between an outer knit fabric wholly of nylon and another outer woven fabric containing by weight 65 percent or more of micro fiber polyester.

A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fabrics of man-made fibers consisting of one or two layers of expanded poly-tetrafluoroethylene sheeting layered between an outer knit fabric wholly of nylon and another outer woven fabric containing by weight 65 percent or more of micro fiber polyester.
